price: Kwa maji hayo vitayayushwa viliomo matumboni mwao, na ngozi zao pia.
arabic: يُصۡهَرُ بِهِۦ مَا فِي بُطُونِهِمۡ وَٱلۡجُلُودُ
footnotes: Yatawapenya mpaka kwenye matumbo yao, viliomo ndani viyayuke kama zitavyo yayuka ngozi zao!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yuṣ'haru bihi mā fī buṭūnihim wal-julūdu
